comments:
build 2002-03-14 on Win98.

Not sure if this is SWT/UI/Team.
Not sure if it is reproducable.
Open views:
- navigator
- outline
- packages (tiled behind navigator)
- CVS repositories
- tasks
- delta spy (core debug tool)

- loaded org.eclipse.core.runtime from dev.eclipse.org

This was due to a problem in Core's spy utility. Moving to Core to
close/move/dispose.
